modName: Cloud - Final Fantasy 7CC Clothes and Hairstyle
summary: This mod adds Cloud\'s Clothes and Hairstyle from Final Fantasy 7, based on his Crisis Core appearance.
descriptionHtml:
CloudFF7CCClothes&Hair
by hardarg
v1.0

================================
[color=orange][b]D E S C R I P T I O N[/b][/color]
================================
[i]\"Alright everyone, let\'s mosey.\"[/i] -[b]Cloud[/b]

This mod adds Cloud\'s outfit and hairstyle from Final Fantasy 7, based on his Crisis Core appearance.

It available in the forge as heavy armor, as well as being temperable.

Use help rookie 4 for easier access to items.
Use showracemenu to change hairstyle.


================================
[color=orange][b]C H A N G E L O G[/b][/color]
================================
v1.0	(02/18/2013)
  Outfit and Hairstyle released


================================
[color=orange][b]I N S T A L L A T I O N[/b][/color]
================================
NMM
1.) Download with Manager
2.) Activate Cloud - FinalFantasy7CC Clothes and Hairstyle, under Armor Calegory.
3.) Play and Enjoy.

Manual Installation
1.) Extract data folder in this archive to a temporary folder, preferably on the Desktop for easier access.
2.) Copy the extracted data folder to your Skyrim directory.
3.) Launch Skyrim, enable hardargCloud.esp in your data files.
4.) Play and Enjoy.


================================
[color=orange][b]U N I N S T A L L A T I O N[/b][/color]
================================
If you have other mods made by me installed, then only delete Cloud subfolders from hardarg folder. Otherwise...
Delete the folders named hardarg, in your meshes and textures folder.


================================
[color=orange][b]K N O W N  B U G S  /  I N C O M P A T I B I L I T I E S[/b][/color]
================================
Please report, if found any.


================================
[color=orange][b]F . A . Q[/b][/color]
================================
Q: Why make Cloud?
A: Originally meantly to be released only as a hairstyle alongside Zack\'s, but then I felt it was incomplete without an outfit. Lo and behold you get his Shinra Infantryman uniform, which wasn\'t made yet.

Q: Will you make Cloud\'s clothing from xxxxxx?
A: No plans so far, I\'m afraid.

Q: Is this wearable for Beast races?
A: No.


================================
[color=orange][b]C O N T A C T[/b][/color]
================================
I am reachable via PM,

================================

================================
[color=orange][b]C R E D I T S  &  S P E C I A L  T H A N K S[/b][/color]
================================
